snippet: Blaming German expansionism is simplistic in today's debate, in which historians think the war's roots were far more tangled.
lead_paragraph: Blaming German expansionism is simplistic in today's debate, in which historians think the war's roots were far more tangled.

headline.main: 100 Years After the Great War, the Bad Guy Is Still Elusive
